edwipmod.title.title: EdwiP Mod Configuration
edwipmod.prefix.letter:
Example: heLLo WOrlD!
Lower All -> hello world!
Upper All -> HELLO WORLD!
First Letter -> Hello world!
First Every Letter -> Hello World!

Option not in the list will keep Reason as the same.
edwipmod.prefix.discord.discord_format: Can be used with Discord format.
edwipmod.prefix.server_switcher.server: Can use <SERVER> to replace server id.
edwipmod.config.general.skin_cloner.tool: Enable skin cloner, will be saved as skin folder in Minecraft folder (Quite expensive).
edwipmod.config.kick.title: Kick Settings
edwipmod.config.kick.letter.second_comma:
Execute second command after kicking (works only for Minecraft players)
Can include <PLAYER> and <REASON>.
Change letters capitalization for second command executor.
Time to delay the second command execution (in ticks) after kicking.
edwipmod.config.warn.title: Warn Settings
edwipmod.config.discord.title: Discord Chat Log
edwipmod.config.discord.timestamp.toolti: Time stamp format at the beginning of each message. Leave empty for no time stamp.
edwipmod.config.discord.username.tooltip: Replace <PLAYER>. Can be used in 4 options below.
edwipmod.config.discord.moderator_webhoo: Display a different embed message whenever players are kicked/warned or banned. Leave empty for no embed messages.
edwipmod.config.discord.exclude.tooltip:
Exclude messages with matched regexes.
Visit regex101.com to know more about regex.
edwipmod.config.discord.outputs.tooltip: Can be used with Discord format. Each group is captured by (1), (2), etc.
edwipmod.config.chats_writer.title: Chats Writer
edwipmod.config.chats_writer.file_name.t:
The name of the .txt file in Minecraft folder.
Leave empty to disable.
edwipmod.config.discord.delay.tool_tip: Time to wait (in ticks) before sending next message.
edwipmod.config.server_switcher.title: Server Switcher
edwipmod.config.server_switcher.auto_swi: Switch to latest server automatically when joining Mineplay server.
Time to wait (in ticks) before switching servers.
Time to wait (in ticks) before stopping trying to teleport (due to errors).

Change prefix to detect (<Prefix> server).
Can use (?i) in front of your regex to make it non-case sensitive.
Choose a random message to response after successfully detecting prefix.
Choose a random message to response after successfully teleporting.
Choose a random message to response after failing to teleport.
Choose a random message to response when attempting to teleport to the same server.
Choose a random message to response after failing to teleport in various ways.
edwipmod.config.chats_writer.username.to: Replace <PLAYER>. Can be used in the options below.
